老師很親切，有任何問題都能及時幫助我們，上課也非常認真。幾乎每周都有作業，但是作業內容負荷量都不會到很大，可以學到很多。

Chier provides different essay styles, survey, and email with step-by-step instructions for students to practice
the business news review part is especially helpful. it motivates me to read news and summarize in my own words
